    # DFS and BFS

    # Recursion of Memoization

    # Memoization of Fibonacci

    The Python code is:

    def fib(N):
    cache = {}
    def recur_fib(N):
        if N in cache:
            return cache[N]
        if N < 2:
            result = N
        else:
            result = recur_fib(N - 1) + recur_fib(N - 2)

        cache[N] = result
        return result
    return recur_fib(N)
